Contact - Chingford Golf Course Skip to main content Chingford Golf Course London, England Home Gallery Flyover Visitors Clubs Hire Equipment Contact Online Booking Member Booking Visitor Booking Food at Chingford Golf Course Book Tee Times Contact Contact Chingford Golf Course 4 Bury Road, Chingford, London, England E4 7QJ Phone : 020 8529 2085 Email : chingfordgolfcourse@cityoflondon.gov.uk Social Media : How to find us By train Chingford Golf Course is served by London Overground from London Liverpool Street Station. Trains arrive and depart every 15 minutes. London Overground Chingford From Chingford station to the course is just a five minute walk. For walking directions, please visit Google Maps . For help planning your journey, we recommend Transport for London’s Journey Planner . By car Chingford Golf Course can be reached from most of London and Essex. For help planning your route by road, we recommend Google Maps . Free parking is available at Bury Road, located directly adjacent to the café and golf shop. By bus Chingford is easily reached by bus from across North and East London using routes 97, 179, 212, 313, 379, 385, 397 and 444. For help planning your journey by bus, we recommend Transport for London’s Journey Planner . Copyright © 2025 Chingford Golf Course All Rights Reserved. Powered by Copyright © 2017 City of London Corporation. All Rights Reserved.

Contact Us | Belfairs Golf Club :: Essex Members Login Welcome Visitors Information Green Fees Membership Safeguarding Adult Safeguarding Policy Children & Young Person Safeguarding Members & Visitors Code of Conduct Equality, Diversity & Inclusion Policy Club Disciplinary Regulations Golf The Course Scorecard Tour of the Course Local Rules General Club Noticeboard Clubhouse Social Programme Clubhouse Noticeboard Charity Page Dress Code R & A Club History Course Conditions Pro Shop Members Mens Captain's Welcome Mens Noticeboard Mens Competition News Mens Match Overview Ladies Ladies Captain's Welcome Ladies Noticeboard Ladies Club Competition Overview Ladies Match Overview Mixed Mixed Club Competition Overview Mixed Match Overview Seniors Seniors Welcome Seniors Noticeboard Seniors Club Competition Overview Seniors Match Overview Juniors Juniors Welcome Juniors Noticeboard Juniors Club Competition Overview Juniors Match Overview Club Gallery Honours Board Mens Honours Board Ladies Honours Board Seniors Honours Board Juniors Honours Board Members Only Diary Map/Directions Contact Us Recent Site Updates CAPTAIN'S DAY: July 6th 24-Jul-2025 13:16 LADIES CAPTAIN'S DAY: June 26th 24-Jul-2025 12:43 Club Gallery 24-Jul-2025 12:40 Contact Us Belfairs Golf Club, Eastwood Road North, Leigh-on-Sea, Essex, SS9 4LR Should you have any questions or comments please feel free to get in touch. You can use the online contact form below, where your message will be dealt with as appropriate, or alternatively contact us on the telephone numbers below. Honorary Secretary , Peter Mahoney: Tel: 01702 526 911 You may complete this form to send an email directly to Belfairs Golf Club. Alternatively, you can send an email to the following email address: info@belfairsgolfclub.co.uk . Contact Form Name Email Phone Subject **Please select an option** Clubhouse General Membership Members Website Account Request a Handicap Certificate Visitor Message Please do not provide anything sensitive here, like health details, or your credit card number. Verification We do not support SPAM and we would never sell your information to anyone. Any correspondence is strictly confidential. We will only use the above information to contact you about your query. Address Belfairs Golf Club Eastwood Road North Leigh-on-Sea Essex SS9 4LR Contact phone: 01702 526 911 email: info@belfairsgolfclub.co.uk Tee Times phone: 01702 525 345 Links RSS Feed Cookie and Privacy Contact Us Map/Directions Copyright © Belfairs Golf Club , 2011-2025. Mint Valley Course Email GolfProShop@ci.longview.wa.us Ron Freem and Associates Course Architect 1976 How to Find Us Traveling South on I-5 Take Kelso Exit 40 off I-5. Follow signs to Highway 4. Travel six miles west on Highway 4, turning right on 38th, then left on Pennsylvania. Traveling North on I-5 Take Longview Exit 36 off I-5. Follow signs to Highway 4 west, turning right on 38th, then left on Pennsylvania. Sorry - your browser does not support iframes. Visitor Centre: Get In Touch  | Treetop Golf Explore Treetop Menu Plan your trip Get in touch Welcome to our visitor centre Got a question to ask? You don’t need to call into Treetop’s Canopy FM radio show to be heard around here — just fill out the form below and our helpful guides will get back to you as soon as possible. Your questions are important to us, and we strive to provide prompt and thorough answers. So go ahead, reach out, and let us help you navigate your way.
